attributes.action: Give Margaret Thatcher a full State Funeral including lying in state
attributes.additional_details:
Britain's greatest Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher has died on April 8th 2013.

Margaret Thatcher deserves a full state funeral and deserves in accordance with her wishes to lie in state.

This petition calls upon Her Majesty's Government to ensure that the great Lady Thatcher receives a full state funeral including lying in state.
